description: This virus is classified in the BSL 3 category. This Dengue virus 2[Papete 341.175] is preserved under Freeze Dried (-20°C).Tests for the presence of mycoplasmae were negative.	The dengue virus (DENV) in one of five serotypes is the cause of dengue fever. It is a mosquito-borne single positive-stranded RNA virus of the family Flaviviridae; genus Flavivirus. All four serotypes can cause the full spectrum of disease.
name: DENV 2 Papete 341.175 antigen
